text.div:
Summary

Defining URLhttp://terminology.hl7.org/NamingSystem/CDT
NameCDT
Statusactive
Definition

The purpose of the CDT Code is to achieve uniformity, consistency and specificity in accurately documenting dental treatment. One use of the CDT Code is to provide for the efficient processing of dental claims, and another is to populate an Electronic Health Record.

PublisherAmerican Dental Association

Identifiers

TypeValuePreferredPeriodComment
OID2.16.840.1.113883.6.13true
URIhttp://www.ada.org/cdttrue2021-04-05 --> (ongoing)Official canonical URL going forward.
URIhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/CD2falseMaintained for backward compatibility.

extension.valueString: Code on Dental Procedures and Nomenclature
